vsParam:
Yes... What's wrong, Sorel.
Why do you panic...

Ah! What's wrong with the doll...
It's body is severely damaged...

Er... I use it in class,
and make it talk and move with wizardry.
But I guess it didn't withstand the power this time...

Is it broken... Show me.
Er... uh... I see. This can be repaired.

Really!? Mmm, Cresson, you are so great!
You are really one of the best tailor in the Academy♪

He's a professional tailor, you know.
Er, so reliable!

W...wait a minute! I am good at sewing,
but I am a guard, okay!? Make no mistake about it!

Ha-ha, just kidding.
Please repair it.

Hmm, repairing it is easy...
But, besides the broken parts, many places are worn.

Since I am going to repair it, why don't we
use some new cloths to thoroughly repair it?

We can count on [px]♪
Please, can you make some cloths for me using alchemy?

Ho ho, please her with it.
Look at that poor doll!

Please change a stronger
cloth for it, okay!?

Ha-ha, thank you, [px].
Please prepare the cloth for the doll!
